author: "Castelli, Bartolomeo, 16th cent."
title: "Lexicon medicum Graeco Latinum / a Bartholomaeo Castello ... inchoatum ... Nunc vero in commodum publicum, opera et studio Adriani Ravesteini ... Ex Hippocrate et Galeno desumptum Avicenn. atque aliorum celeberrimorum medicorum monumentis, tertia quidem s"
